Instruction: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and set aside.
Cut broccoli into florets, zucchini into thin slices, and cherry tomatoes in half.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Mince garlic and add to the skillet. Cook for 30 seconds, or until fragrant.
Add broccoli, zucchini, and cherry tomatoes to the skillet. Cook until slightly tender, about 5 minutes.
Add vegetable broth, nutritional yeast, lemon juice, salt, black pepper, and red pepper flakes to the skillet. Bring to a simmer.
Add cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to coat.
